###  [ Nexalin Technology to Present at the Spring MicroCap Rodeo Conference on June 6th ](https://nexalin.com/ir-calendar/nexalin-technology-to-present-at-the-spring-microcap-rodeo-conference-on-june-6th/ "Nexalin Technology to Present at the Spring MicroCap Rodeo Conference on June 6th")

HOUSTON, TEXAS, June 5, 2024 – Nexalin Technology, Inc. (the “Company” or “Nexalin”) (Nasdaq: NXL; NXLIW) announced today that it will be participating in the Spring MicroCap Rodeo Conference, that will be held on Thursday, June 6, 2024 in New York City. Mark White, Chief...

## Scientific Advisory Board 

Our Scientific Advisory Board advises our management team in planning, development, and execution of scientific, clinical and research and development initiatives and strategies. Our Scientific Advisory Board consists of experts across a range of key disciplines relevant to our initiatives.

## COMPANY INFORMATION

## FAQs

# Who can investors contact for more information?

Crescendo Communications, LLC

Email: nxl@crescendo-ir.com

T: 212-671-1020

Website: [www.crescendo-ir.com](https://www.crescendo-ir.com/)

# What is Nexalin Technology, Inc.’s stock symbol?

Our stock is traded on the Nasdaq under the symbol NXL. The warrants trade under the symbol NXLIW

# When was Nexalin Technology, Inc. incorporated?

We were originally formed as a Nevada corporation on October 19, 2010 as Nexalin Technology, Inc. On December 1, 2021, we merged with and into a newly incorporated Delaware company of the same name.

# When did Nexalin Technology, Inc. become a public company?

Nexalin Technology, Inc. completed its IPO and listed on the Nasdaq in September, 2022

# Where is Nexalin Technology, Inc. located?

Our principal executive offices are located at 1776 Yorktown, Suite 550, Houston, TX 77056

# When is Nexalin Technology, Inc.’s fiscal year end?

The fiscal year end is December 31

![](https://pixel.wp.com/g.gif?v=ext&blog=196670293&post=4347&tz=-5&srv=nexalin.com&j=1%3A13.0&host=nexalin.com&ref=&fcp=3413&rand=0.9896803613185898)
